content.prompt: Which of the following best explains Austrian foreign minister Klemens von Metternichâ€™s purpose in setting up the Concert of Europe?

choices.label: To make Austria the strongest military power in Europe
To support cultural improvements as a way of promoting nationalism
To suppress lingering revolutionary sentiment in Europe
To bring about the unification of Germany

topic.text: 6.5: The Concert of Europe and European Conservatism

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
